title: See Emerald Fennell’s New Edition of ‘Wuthering Heights’ (Exclusive)
summary: The filmmaker curated a brand new cover image, and wrote a foreword for the classic novel, inspired by her upcoming big screen adaptation.

title: Inside H&M’s Beverly Hills Store Opening With Julez Smith and Grandmother Tina Knowles
summary: THR caught up with Smith to talk H&M, his burgeoning modeling career and the big project on his horizon for 2026 with a new clothing line.
